segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of overstaying.

segments.pli: Āvāsamaccharī hoti, kulamaccharī hoti, lābhamaccharī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, dhammamaccharī hoti.
segments.en: You become stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of overstaying.
There are these five benefits of staying for a reasonable length of time.

segments.pli: Na āvāsamaccharī hoti, na kulamaccharī hoti, na lābhamaccharī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, na dhammamaccharī hoti.
segments.en: You’re not stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samavatthavāse”ti.
segments.en: These are the five benefits of staying for a reasonable length of time.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of overstaying.
